name: cover-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in a museum to receive a tirtouga.
short_effect: Can be revived into a tirtouga.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It appears as though it could be part of its back.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It appears as though it could be part of its back.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It appears as though it could be part of its back.
